name: Crush™3D
description:
CRUSH™3D - A puzzle with another dimension.

Reinvented for the Nintendo 3DS, CRUSH™3D is the unique platform game that gives you the ability to change perspective from 2D to 3D as you try to solve brain-teasing puzzles.

CRUSH™3D tells the story of Danny, an inquisitive character who volunteers to test his friend’s amazing C.R.U.S.H. machine.

Dozens of levels
Over 50 levels of mind stretching puzzles spread across four stunning environments, each recreating a specific aspect of Danny’s inner world.

Never get stuck!
Come to grips with the game via an all new tutorial and hint system that help you learn the ropes of CRUSH™3D and reveal hints whenever you’re stuck in a level.
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
